channel.title: Pickup command?
channel.description: the new server/client i have downloaded does not have a pickup command for admin, mods. how can i make one?

item.title: Pickup command?
item.dc:creator: @haksilence haksilence
item.description:
@haksilence wrote:

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights > 1) { String[] args = command.split(" "); if(args.length == 3) { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); if (newItemID <= 160000 && newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sM("No such item."); } } else { sM("Oops! Use as ::pickup 995 100"); } } }

here is mine.

i did not make this . this was riped from my delta client

Read full topic
